1.Capture Dialogue: I've failed you my avian friends...
1.Kill Dialogue: Curse you humans and your technology!
1.Player Lose Dialogue: To think you could beat me... What a ridiculous thought.

2.Capture Dialogue: This isn't the last you'll hear of me! I've been in prison before.
2.Kill Dialogue: I just wanted to help other animals.

3.Capture Dialogue: No jail or zoo can ground me. I'll fly. I'll escape.
3.Kill Dialogue: To think I've gotten this far... my brethren...
